mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_QA.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into TBL_QA (QUESTION_ID, MEMBER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE) values (#{questionId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT Q.MEMBER_ID, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.PILL_ID, M.NAME, M.GENDER, A.ANSWER_TITLE, A.ANSWER_NO FROM TBL_QA Q, TBL_MEMBER M, TBL_ANSWER A WHERE Q.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID AND Q.QUESTION_ID = A.QUESTION_ID

SELECT Q.QUESTION_ID, Q.MEMBER_ID, Q.PILL_ID, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.VIEW_COUNT, TO_CHAR(Q.WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, M.NAME, M.GENDER, A.ANSWER_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(A.ANSWER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ANSWER_DATE, A.ANSWER_NO, E.NAME expertName, E.JOB, E.PHARMACY_ADDRESS FROM TBL_QA Q, TBL_MEMBER M, TBL_ANSWER A, TBL_EXPERT_MEMBER E WHERE Q.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID AND Q.QUESTION_ID = A.QUESTION_ID AND E.EXPERT_ID = A.EXPERT_ID
